content: showing prevails in Saying, even in everything that waits for us unspoken > Saying not linguistic expression added to phenomenon: all radiant appearance/fading away grounded (beruht) in showing Saying > Saying pervades (durchwaltet)/structures (fügt) openness of clearing (das Freie der Lichtung) that every appearance must seek & every disappearance must leave behind, in which all present/absent being must show/say/announce itself > Saying: the gathering that joins all appearance (alles Scheinen fügende Versammlung), lets all that shows abide w/in itself, the in-itself manifold showing

content: where does the showing spring (rührt) from? slow down, enough to heed (achten) what stirs/quickens (regt) in the showing, and bears this quickness out

content: [method of arrival, in the instant?] we need a plain, sudden, unforgettable thus forever new look (Blick) into something we don’t even try to know > the quick and stirring regsames Erregende) of Saying: earliest/most ancient at once, region of all places, first break of dawn for all that is present/absent, that which makes the cycle of day/night possible: Das Regende im Zeigen der Sage ist das Eignen ——Eignen (Owning) that moves Saying as Showing is Ereignis, yields (er-gibt) opening of the clearing, in which present beings can persist (anwähren) & absent beings can depart, while keeping (behalten) their persistence (Währen) in withdrawal (im Entzug) [cf. erasure of trace] > das Ereignende [what is yielding] ist das Ereignis selbst—nothing else > Ereignis can’t be represented as occurrence (Vorkommnis) or happening (Geschehen), “can only be experienced as abiding gift yielded (Gewährende) by saying” > Ereignis is not the result of something, but the giving yield (Er-gebnis), whose giving along gives us Es gibt, to which even Being needs to come [so to come] into its own as presence (um als Anwesen in sein Eigenes zu gelangen)

content: way: to bring way forth, to be the way > Ereignis appropriates man to its own usage (Brauch) > Ereignis is the way-making for Saying to come into language > way-making (Be-wëgung) puts essence of language as language (Sage) into language > the way to language has transformed along the way [when we attend], via human activity, shifted to appropriating nature of language > only appears as a shift (Verlagerung) to us, w/ re: to ourselves > [Heidegger adds Gelassenheit as term to describe us listening freely to this appropriating nature of language]

content: Saying has already overtaken (überholt) destructiveness of information-language because Appropriation can’t be commandeered (Unbestellbaren des Ereignisses)? > all true language (eigentliche Sprache), because sent/assigned/destined (geschickt) by way-making of Saying, is in the nature of destiny (dadurch geschicklich) > no natural language of human w/out destiny, all language is historical > information-language too is historical, in sense of limits of present era > this era begins nothing new, only carries the old aspects of modern age to the extreme

content: if to know means to see something in wholeness of its nature, we can’t see the nature of language as such, in the round, because we belong w/in Saying, can only say something by saying it after Saying > language is monologue [cf. MONL], has its structure in the Aufriss of Saying: 1) language alone speaks authentically 2) language speaks lonesomely (einsam) > the some in lonesome, the same, Greek hama, Gothic sama, thus lonesome: “same in what unites that which belongs together” > Saying is in need of being voiced in word [Being needs man] > man’s needed usage (Brauchen), his resaying (Nachsagen) of what he listens to, lies in that lack (Fehlen) that isn’t negative or defective
